coreAttributes.name: Fruit Bat's Juice Box
coreAttributes.description: A small cardboard carton, labelled as 'Fruit Bat's Juice Box'. On one side of the carton, there's an image of a scantily-clad bat-girl squeezing the juice from all sorts of fruit over her breasts.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementMana(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A cool wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_ARCANE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Tearing the attached straw from the front of the Fruit Bat's Juice Box, [npc.name] [npc.verb(use)] it to pierce the foil circle on the top, before wrapping [npc.her] [npc.lips] around it and quickly drinking all of the tropical-fruits-flavoured liquid contained within.
useDescriptions.otherUse: Tearing the attached straw from the front of the Fruit Bat's Juice Box, [npc.name] [npc.verb(use)] it to pierce the foil circle on the top, before getting [npc2.name] to wrap [npc2.her] [npc2.lips] around it and drink all of the tropical-fruits-flavoured liquid contained within.
